author: George Orwell
quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
description: A dystopian masterpiece about totalitarian control and surveillance.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
quote: And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
description: A magical story of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who yearns to travel in search of a worldly treasure.

title: The Universe in a Nutshell
author: Stephen Hawking
description: A guide to the universe's most important theories, from quantum mechanics to M-theory, presented with Hawking's signature clarity.

title: Pet Sematary
author: Stephen King
description: A chilling tale of a cursed burial ground that brings the dead back to life with terrifying consequences.

title: Brief Answers to the Big Questions
author: Stephen Hawking
quote: We are just an advanced breed of monkeys on a minor planet of a very average star. But we can understand the universe.
description: Hawking's final thoughts on the biggest questions: Is there a God? Can we predict the future? Is time travel possible?

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
quote: Nothing in life is as important as you think it is while you are thinking about it.
description: A groundbreaking tour of the mind that explains the two systems that drive the way we think and make choices.

title: It
author: Stephen King
description: A group of kids face their fears when a shape-shifting entity emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children.

title: Homo Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
quote: We study history not to know the future but to widen our horizons.
description: A groundbreaking narrative of humanity's creation and evolution that explores how biology and history have defined us.

title: Homo Deus
author: Yuval Noah Harari
quote: In the 21st century, humans are likely to make a serious bid for immortality.
description: A provocative exploration of humanity's future, examining how we might overcome death, find happiness, and become gods.

title: The Mom Test
author: Rob Fitzpatrick
quote: Everyone lies to you about whether your business is a good idea.
description: How to talk to customers and learn if your business is a good idea when everyone is lying to you.

title: The Little Book of Cosmology
author: Lyman Page
quote: The universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
description: A concise introduction to cosmology, covering the Big Bang, dark matter, and the cosmic microwave background.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
quote: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.
description: Tiny changes, remarkable results. A proven framework for improving every day.

title: A Brief History of Time
author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Even if there is only one possible unified theory, it is just a set of rules and equations.
description: From the Big Bang to black holes, Hawking's bestselling exploration of the universe and its mysteries.

title: Continuous Discovery Habits
author: Teresa Torres
quote: The best product teams make decisions based on what they learn from their customers.
description: Discover techniques for conducting product research, user interviews, and iterating based on customer feedback.

title: Light in the Darkness
author: Unknown
quote: Even in the darkest night, a single light can illuminate the path forward.
description: A compelling story about finding hope and purpose in challenging times.
